page.title: 10LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: There are lots activities for all ages in Denholm and district,the primary school boys have Beavers,Cubs and scouts. Primary School girls have Brownies and Guides,some of the Guides go on to RedCross.These children can also go to badminton,sunday school and take part in the Drama group productions. Teenagers can go to Scouts,Guides,Badminton,Drama Group, until recently the village had a Youth club,which met in the school on sunday evenings.Discos are sometimes held by different groups.For children to play on there are two Play Parks with Swings,Round abouts,climbing frames, and See Saws.On the village greens there are a set of Rugby posts.In the summer Cricket is played,and in the winter there is Rugby and Football,with the school the girls play Hocky.TURN TO PAGE ELEVEN
